title: Multimedia Database-Based Mathematics Education Design Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service/in-service teachers to enhance multimedia database utilization skills, including simulation practices for designing customized mathematics education content via hypermedia and standardized curricular pathways

learning_goals: Learners can analyze multimedia database structures to establish math education content mapping strategies.
Learners can design hypermedia-based standard educational pathways to address multiple learner proficiency levels.
Learners can test and improve database-integrated educational modules in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
